title: romal86
author: romal86
content: help set up coin RADIANT mining in my GPU. 20.09 listing TXbit exchange

comments.author: igotek
comments.body: The difficulty is sky rocket. X2 now.it s not profitable now.there is no calculator. you cannot know how many coins you will get.mature time is so high.the oc is with the same kaspa.kaspa is better than RXD

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Calculatorhttps://minerstat.com/coin/RXDFrom September 18 to September 24, it was profitable mining, but after many bloggers talked about this coin, the profit ended. According to the video of the French miner, set up mining without problems, a translator is not needed if you are well versed in Hive OS.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: romal86 on September 18, 2022, 05:56:34 PMhelp set up coin RADIANT mining in my GPU. 20.09 listing TXbit exchange    You already have instructions how to mine but it is one of those coins who is mined only from people in the long term project of the coin.I checked as this thread made me curious but when I saw in the minerstat website a big warning that this coin has had low volume trading in the last 24 h and last week it reinforced my view that this coin is one of them that you can mine for a month,put it in the wallet and move on to other coins.It is a hit or miss coin like many others that erupted after the Ethereum merge.For the moment there is no real profitable coin to mine,I mean profitable like the days before the Ethereum merge so only bold people choose a coin they believe in and mine it for the future.

Wait some days for and the volume will rise fast. The hashrate and difficulty is also exploding at the moment. But i don´t recommend to hold it for long.

But i don´t recommend to hold it for long.At this price, mining is not profitable on video cards. The future of this coin is now very doubtful.https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/radiant#marketsThis is another fork of bitcoin for mining on video cardshttps://medium.com/@RadiantLayerOne/radiant-a-peer-to-peer-digital-asset-system-fa46bf24d544Block Time: 5 minutesInitial Block Size: 128 MB, designed to achieve 10GB+Block Reward Schedule: 50,000 RXD per blockBlock Reward Halvening: 2 yearsBlock Reward Halvening: 2 yearsMaximum Supply: 21,000,000,000 RXD288 blocks per day of 50,000 coins is 14.4 million coins per day or 10.5 billion coins in 2 years.

comments.author: a1383414
comments.body: Have anyone provide GPU 1660 super set parameters?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: a1383414 on October 01, 2022, 01:51:37 PMHave anyone provide GPU 1660 super set parameters?The hashrate in the mining of the RADIANT coin depends on the frequency of the core of the video card, overclocking the memory does not greatly affect the hashrate. You need to choose the optimal core frequency, power consumption and hashrate mode with a wattmeter. The higher the core frequency, the greater the overheating. You can use the settings for the RVN coin.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Here you can vote to add the Radiant coin to the exbitron exchangehttps://www.exbitron.com/voteTo vote, you need to buy EXTO coins. The cost of the coin is small, cheaper than 2 centshttps://coinpaprika.com/valjuta/exto-exbitron-digital-token/Exbitron Digital Token [EXTO] is a token based on TRON blockchain. The most actual price for one Exbitron Digital Token [EXTO] is $0.019269

comments.body: TT-Miner Version 2022.4.2 for Windows and Linux is available verry verry fast devfee 1 %WildRig Multi 0.35.3 beta  fast and verry stable miner software devfee 1%BzMiner (v12.2.0) miner software  not satble devfee 1%https://github.com/RadiantBlockchain/rad-bfgminer bad rxd mining software 1 % devfeeDownload Radiator mining software Windows 64 no stinkin devfee: 0 %https://github.com/xiaolin1579/radiator

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: [New Coin Listing] Radiant Blockchain (RXD) Launchs on DigiFinex!DigiFinex will list Radiant Blockchain (RXD). The specific time schedule is as follows:Time of opening deposit: Mar. 29th 2024 7:00(UTC)Time of opening trading: Mar. 29th 2024 9:00(UTC)Time of opening withdrawal: Mar. 29th 2024 9:00(UTC)Trading pair: RXD/USDT(Click to Trade),  RXD/BTC(Click to Trade)Project name: Radiant Blockchain (RXD)Official website(Click to View)Blockchain explorer(Click to View)Token Introduction:The Radiant Blockchain is the best of Bitcoin and Ethereum combined to create a revolutionary capability for crosschain marketplaces and onchain digital assets. Radiant’s future-proofed atomicals-ready design and Turing-Complete Layer 1 enables digital assets to move seamlessly on/off chain with perfect immutability. Its hybrid UTXO/account-based structure enables the capabilities and advantages of both designs. Radiant is expanding through a decentralized community and its growth accelerates as the community grows.Radiant’s hybrid platform prominently features novel and one-of-kind Induction Proofs that resolve the scalability problems of other chains. The unique Induction Proofs enable instant verification of ledger balances directly from transaction outputs to facilitate near-zero fees, as well as securing and instantly transmitting 0-conf transactions at a rate of 4,000 TXs/sec. Thus, Radiant benefits from instant transaction validation, while also featuring a stable 5-min blocktime and scalable block sizes of up to 256 Mb. Radiant’s unique combination of technology and Induction Proofs gives Radiant an unrivaled ability to store and send digital assets, and to offer supercharged smart contracts for the users of Radiant and other blockchains.https://support.digifinex.com/hc/en-us/articles/30380994539033

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Radiant network Radiant network is under attack by an unknown miner (FPGA/ASIC)Because of this, the complexity of the RXD network has almost doubled, which negatively affects the profitability of GPU miners.https://t.me/journalmainera/3320unknown miner - 200.35 TH/shttps://vipor.net/miners/rxd_pplns_1all hashrate 208 TH/shttps://miningpoolstats.stream/radiantThe unknown miner has 96% hashrate. Why is he mining on someone else's pool?

comments.author: energy_xxx
comments.body: rxd was listed in mexc and there were rumors of asic in the groups, it may increase even more hasrate

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: I don't understand what's going on with this coin. On Twitter there are only announcements of listing on new exchanges, when 95% are owned by one miner.I think the exchange should stop listing.I don’t mine this coin and I’m too lazy to figure out what’s going on, but in my opinion the community is not reacting to this.If you want to find the reason, here are links to all project resources.https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/radiant

comments.author: energy_xxx
comments.body: The distribution in wallets is more weighted for those after the top 100.Maybe someone is trying to take over most of the supplyA project that was launched shortly after Kaspa came out.One way or another, it is a troublesome situation for the hash power to be taken over by someone
